channel.title: Biggest Issue of my server.... X(
channel.description:
Hey, this is the most annoying issue I have had for a long time and I can't figure out the solution... A long time ago this started and I have never been able to fix it so far... My wilderness sign has disappeared... :| I think what I was doing was editing the projectiles I don't know, but I'd try everything to try to fix it...
I will provide you with my server files... So can some1 help? I'll rep whoever fixed for sure... : :)

item.title: Biggest Issue of my server.... X(
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Yeh, and the thing is, my wild works fine (You can attack and everything), but it just doesn’t show the sign on the bottom left… And I mentioned again… I THINK I was working on adding projectiles to bows when that happened… and also, feel free to ask for any of my server files to examine it… I real desperate to get this fixed… :S

Read full topic

item.title: Biggest Issue of my server.... X(
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Called writeWildy for all of you trying to help him. Its like writePlayers. If hes in safezone the bottom right hand corner of his screen would say Safe, while if he was in a wildy zone it would say Danger.

item.title: Biggest Issue of my server.... X(
item.dc:creator: @X_F_U_R_Y_X X F U R Y X
item.description:
@X_F_U_R_Y_X wrote:

Here are my wildy things…

[code]public int WildyLevel = 0;
public int leftwild = 0;
public boolean InWildrange = false;
public void WriteWildyLevel()
{
checkwildy2();
if(inwildy2 && !nonWild())
{
outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@red@!DANGER!", 199);
leftwild = 1;
}
else if(nonWild() && inwildy2 && leftwild == 1)
{
IsSnowing = 3;
leftwild = 0;
}
}

public void CheckWildrange(int pcombat)
{
if(((combat + WildyLevel >= pcombat) && (pcombat >= combat)) || ((combat - WildyLevel <= pcombat) && (pcombat <= combat)))
{
InWildrange = true;
}
else
{
InWildrange = true;
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Biggest Issue of my server.... X(
item.dc:creator: @micky-g micky-g
item.description:
@micky-g wrote:

so you need that all fixed right[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2007, 02:05:45 AM[/size][hr]that might be it im not sure but it might be it

//wilderness check
if (inwildy2 || duelStatus == 3) {
outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("@dre@R4P3 N00B");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
IsInWilderness = true;
}
if (IsInWilderness(absX, absY, 2) == false && WildernessWarning == true) {
WildernessWarning = false;
} else if (IsInWilderness(absX, absY, 2) == true && WildernessWarning == false) {
sendFrame248(1908, 3213);
WildernessWarning = true;
